title: List Members
description: List Members. This operation is used to get the collection of organization member profiles from Oracle Commerce

searchCriteria.description: Query to filter locations based on site id pick up type and  text matching any of the address fields

limit.description: number of records limit in response

sort.description: parameter name to do sort with

expand.description: This field determines the additional properties to be returned. Possible value for this query parameter is ‘accessRights’ to include accessRights of the organization member profiles.

includedRoles.description: This field determines if only organizational roles or all roles are to be returned for the organization member profile. Default value is 'organizationalRolesForCurrentOrganization’. Possible values are 'organizationalRolesForCurrentOrganization’, 'allRolesForCurrentOrganization’.
